bill_title: revise certain provisions regarding lands owned by the Department of Game, Fish and Parks.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions regarding lands owned by the Department of Game, Fish and Parks. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 41-4 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: Notwithstanding any other provisions, all land owned by the Department of Game, Fish and Parks shall be transferred to the state. The Department of Game, Fish and Parks is prohibited from buying any real property. Section 2. That § 10-6-31.6 be repealed. 10-6-31.6. Notwithstanding the provisions of § 10-6-31.3, any state-owned public shooting area or a state-owned game production area as identified pursuant to § 41-4-8 that is owned and managed by the Department of Game, Fish and Parks shall be assessed and taxed as agricultural land. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.161 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
